name: Tongue of the Fatman
description:
Tongue of the Fatman is an arcade-fighting game developed by Activision. It was originally released in 1989. Activision Blizzard published the game. The game is rated as "Meh" on RAWG.
You can play Tongue of the Fatman on PC.
Michael Latham, Mike Suarez and Wayne Townsend produced the game.
